title: Largest Net Trade in Goods
description: In 2023, China had the largest net trade in goods globally, amounting to $593.9 billion.

title: Highest Total Reserves
description: As of 2024, China holds the highest total reserves, including gold, valued at approximately $3.26 trillion.

title: Most Extensive Urban Population
description: In 2024, China had the largest population living in urban agglomerations of more than 1 million, totaling 451 million people.

title: Lowest Poverty Headcount Ratio
description: In 2019, China had one of the lowest poverty headcount ratios at national poverty lines, with only 0.6% of the population living in poverty.

title: Lowest International Migrant Stock
description: In 2015, China had the lowest percentage of international migrants, making up only 0.07% of its population.

title: Lowest Battle-related Deaths
description: In 2023, China reported the lowest number of battle-related deaths, with only 1 recorded.

title: Lowest Net Primary Income
description: In 2023, China had the lowest net primary income globally, with a deficit of $148.2 billion.

title: Highest Short-term Debt
description: In 2023, short-term debt constituted 53.19% of China's total external debt, the highest proportion globally.
